meanings.definition: Express regret for something that one has done wrong.
meanings.sent1: I apologised to my friend for breaking their toy.
meanings.sent2: It is important to apologise when you make a mistake.
meanings.sent3: I apologised to the cat for accidentally stepping on its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her sincere apology was like a soothing balm to his hurt feelings.
meanings.sent5: The child's tearful apology melted everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: Offer an apology or excuse for something one has done.
meanings.sent1: She apologised to her teacher for being late to class.
meanings.sent2: It's polite to apologise if you bump into someone.
meanings.sent3: He apologised to the plant for forgetting to water it.
meanings.sent4: His apology was a bridge to mend their strained relationship.
meanings.sent5: The sincere apology helped to heal the rift between them.
